TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IList implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type IList = interface interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 代表可依索引個別存取的非泛型物件集合。

span.span: Represents a non-generic collection of objects that can be individually accessed by index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是的下階介面，並為所有的非泛型清單的基底介面。 is a descendant of the interface and is the base interface of all non-generic lists. 實作可分成三個類別： 唯讀、 固定的大小和大小。 implementations fall into three categories: read-only, fixed-size, and variable-size. 唯讀無法修改。A read-only cannot be modified. 固定大小不允許新增或移除項目，但它可讓您修改現有的項目。A fixed-size does not allow the addition or removal of elements, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 可變大小允許新增、 移除及修改項目。A variable-size allows the addition, removal, and modification of elements. 這個介面的泛型版本，請參閱。For the generic version of this interface, see . ## Examples 下列範例示範實作介面來建立簡單的清單中，固定大小清單。The following example demonstrates the implementation of the interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#01](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/cs/Program.cs#01)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#01](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/vb/Program.vb#01)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Clear() cil managed

summary.span: 從 中移除所有項目。

span.span: Removes all items from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的實作有所不同如何處理和集合的容量。Implementations of this method can vary in how they handle the and the capacity of a collection. 一般而言，計數設為零，而且也會釋放集合的項目從其他物件的參考。Typically, the count is set to zero, and references to other objects from elements of the collection are also released. 容量可以設定為零或預設值，或可以保持不變。The capacity can be set to zero or a default value, or it can remain unchanged. ## Examples 下列範例示範實作介面來建立簡單的清單中，固定大小清單。The following example demonstrates the implementation of the interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list. 這段程式碼是針對較大範例的一部分介面。This code is part of a larger example for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/cs/Program.cs#02)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/vb/Program.vb#02)]

span.span: The is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，這個方法會使用集合的物件並上的方法`item`以判斷項目是否存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ and methods on `item` to determine whether item exists. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，藉由進行這項判斷並方法`item`參數集合中的物件。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下列範例示範實作介面來建立簡單的清單中，固定大小清單。The following example demonstrates the implementation of the interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list. 這段程式碼是針對較大範例的一部分介面。This code is part of a larger example for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/cs/Program.cs#02)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/vb/Program.vb#02)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從.NET Framework 2.0 開始，這個方法會使用集合的物件並上的方法`item`以判斷項目是否存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection’s objects’ and methods on `item` to determine whether item exists. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，藉由進行這項判斷並方法`item`參數集合中的物件。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下列範例示範實作介面來建立簡單的清單中，固定大小清單。The following example demonstrates the implementation of the interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list. 這段程式碼是針對較大範例的一部分介面。This code is part of a larger example for the interface. MemberSignature.Value: public void Insert (int index, object value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Insert(int32 index, object value) cil managed
Public Sub Insert (index As Integer, value As Object)
public: void Insert(int index, System::Object ^ value);
abstract member Insert : int * obj -> unit

param.name: index
param.span: 應該插入 value 之以零啟始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index at which value should be inserted.
The object to insert into the .

summary.span: 將項目插入位於指定索引的 。

span.span: Inserts an item to the at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `index` 等於 中的項目數目，則會將 `value` 附加至結尾。If `index` equals the number of items in the , then `value` is appended to the end. 在連續項目的集合 (例如清單) 中，後面接著插入點的項目會向下移動以容納新項目。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. 如果集合具有索引，則移動之項目的索引也會更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 集合的項目若在概念上群組成 Bucket (例如雜湊資料表)，則不適用這項行為。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. ## Examples 下列範例示範實作介面來建立簡單的清單中，固定大小清單。The following example demonstrates the implementation of the interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list. 這段程式碼是針對較大範例的一部分介面。This code is part of a larger example for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/cs/Program.cs#02)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/vb/Program.vb#02)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合不允許在集合建立後新增或移除項目，但允許對現有項目進行修改。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. ## Examples 下列範例示範實作介面來建立簡單的清單中，固定大小清單。The following example demonstrates the implementation of the interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list. 這段程式碼是針對較大範例的一部分介面。This code is part of a larger example for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/cs/Program.cs#02)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/vb/Program.vb#02)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 唯讀的集合不允許在集合建立後增加、移除或修改項目。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. ## Examples 下列範例示範實作介面來建立簡單的清單中，固定大小清單。The following example demonstrates the implementation of the interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list. 這段程式碼是針對較大範例的一部分介面。This code is part of a larger example for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/cs/Program.cs#02)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/vb/Program.vb#02)]

Default Public Property Item(index As Integer) As Object

member this.Item(int) : obj with get, set

The element at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以使用下列語法提供存取集合中特定元素的能力：`myCollection[index]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`. C# 語言使用關鍵字來定義索引，而不必實作屬性。The C# language uses the keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 會將 實作為預設屬性，這樣會提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. ## Examples 下列範例示範實作介面來建立簡單的清單中，固定大小清單。The following example demonstrates the implementation of the interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list. 這段程式碼是針對較大範例的一部分介面。This code is part of a larger example for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/cs/Program.cs#02)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/vb/Program.vb#02)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Remove(object value) cil managed

span.span: The object to remove from the .

summary.span: 從 移除特定物件之第一個符合的元素。

span.span: Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在相鄰元素的集合中，例如清單，接在移除的元素之後的元素會向上移動以佔用空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，則移動之項目的索引也會更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 集合的項目若在概念上群組成 Bucket (例如雜湊資料表)，則不適用這項行為。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. 如果在 `value` 中找不到 ， 會保持不變，而且不會值回任何例外狀況。If `value` is not found in the , the remains unchanged and no exception is thrown. ## Examples 下列範例示範實作介面來建立簡單的清單中，固定大小清單。The following example demonstrates the implementation of the interface to create a simple list, fixed-size list. 這段程式碼是針對較大範例的一部分介面。This code is part of a larger example for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/cs/Program.cs#02)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.IList_Implementation#02](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.IList_Implementation/vb/Program.vb#02)]

span.span: The is read-only.
-or- The has a fixed size.

span.para: 如果不在清單中，方法應該執行任何動作。特別是，它應該會擲回例外狀況。
If is not in the list, the method should do nothing. In particular, it should not throw an exception.
